long_description: Take your yoga practice on the road with the lightweight Jade Travel yoga mat. Constructed of open-cell natural rubber, a renewable resource from rubber trees; mat contains no PVC. Natural rubber provides good slip resistance even when wet with perspiration. Lightweight mat folds up compactly to fit in your luggage when traveling to yoga retreats. Hand wash Jade Travel yoga mat with mild soap and warm water; hang or lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight.
short_description: Take your yoga practice on the road with the lightweight Jade Travel yoga mat.
